tool_description: Calculates the precise degree positions of all 12 astrological house cusps using various house systems and birth location data.

birth_datetime.description: Birth date and time in UTC format

latitude.description: Geographic latitude in decimal degrees (-90 to 90)

longitude.description: Geographic longitude in decimal degrees (-180 to 180)

house_system.description: House system: placidus, koch, equal, whole_sign, campanus, regiomontanus, porphyry

include_angles.description: Include Ascendant, Midheaven, Descendant, Imum Coeli angles

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90 degrees, longitude between -180 and 180 degrees.
Unsupported house system: Use one of [placidus, koch, equal, whole_sign, campanus, regiomontanus, porphyry].
Polar calculation error: Some house systems cannot be calculated for extreme polar latitudes (>66 degrees).
Invalid birth time: Provide valid UTC datetime for accurate house calculations.
usage: Provide birth_datetime in UTC, latitude, longitude, and optionally specify house_system. Returns degree positions of all house cusps and major angles.

house_cusps.description: Array of 12 house cusp positions in degrees (0-359.99)
